message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you this product at a price of $14,000. I believe it presents significant value at this price point and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I am willing to pay $13,000 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but $13,000 is a bit too low for me. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $13,500?
Alice, thank you for your response. Considering the value of the product, I am willing to pay $13,200 for it.
